plot outline: Following the disappearances of their loved ones, two brave-hearts - Captain Ram and a youngster named Siva Surya - set out to find them. Their investigations lead them on a journey full of peril and adventure, and trouble looms large as they step closer to the truth.
title: Duryodhana
plot: Following the disappearances of their loved ones, two brave-hearts - Captain Ram and a youngster named Siva Surya - set out to find them. Their investigations lead them on a journey full of peril and adventure, and trouble looms large as they step closer to the truth.
